spells.name: Adjustable Polymorph
spells.description: As alter self, but you can change the shape as a swift action.

spells.name: Aggressive Thundercloud, Greater
spells.description: Flying storm cloud deals 6d6 electricity damage.

spells.name: Anti-Incorporeal Shell
spells.description: Incorporeal creatures stay 10 ft. away from you.

spells.name: Curse of Burning Sleep
spells.description: Creature catches fire the next time it sleeps for an hour.

spells.name: Enchantment Foil
spells.description: Trick opponents who try to cast enchantments on you.

spells.name: Mirror Transport
spells.description: Mirror becomes a multiple-use dimension door.

spells.name: Persistent Vigor
spells.description: Gain fast healing 2, immunity to bleed, and faster recovery from diseases and poisons.

spells.name: Spellcrash, Lesser
spells.description: Target loses a 3rd-level prepared spell or spell slot.

spells.name: Symbol of Laughter
spells.description: Triggered rune makes nearby creatures lose actions for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Triggered Suggestion
spells.description: As suggestion, but triggered only and target doesn't remember the suggestion.

spells.name: Unbearable Brightness
spells.description: Your glowing body dazzles or blinds others.

spells.name: Wall of Blindness/Deafness
spells.description: Creatures that pass through a translucent wall are blinded or deafened.
